title: AIIMS Madurai Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 04 Nursing Superintendent Posts
description: All India Institute of Sciences (AIIMS), Madurai has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 04 Superintendent Engineering, Nursing Superintendent, and  Personal Assistant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech in Civil Engineering, GNM, and Diploma can grab this chance and apply for the AIIMS Madurai Recruitment 2025 .
